name: Saints Row 2: Ultor Exposed
description: Ultor Exposed is the first downloadable content pack (DLC) for Saints Row 2. It tells the story of Saints trying to expose the dark side of Ultor Corporation with the help of one of Ultor's workers. DLC features three new singleplayer missions (co-op enabled), a new friendly NPC, a variety of new vehicles, craft and character customization options. Also included are four new multiplayer maps.
